title: Weatherford College Foundation Scholarship
Description:: The Weatherford College Foundation Scholarships are available to students at Weatherford College.

title: Dennis A. Davis Family Scholarship
Description:: The Dennis A. Davis Family Scholarship is available to students enrolled in the School of Ministry at Northwest University.  You must demonstrate citizenship, financial need, a Christian lifestyle showing constructive leadership in a Christian college environment, and promise for full-time ministry to be eligible for this award.  Additionally, you must be recommended by the Dennis Davis family.  Preference is given to seniors

title: OCC Wentcher Scholars Program
Description:: The Wentcher Scholars Program is open to entering freshmen at Oakton Community College.  You must demonstrate talent, character, and need to be considered for this award.

title: AbbVie Crohn's and Colitis Scholarship
Description:: The AbbVie Crohn's and Colitis Scholarship is available to students living with Crohn's disease, ulcerative colitis or another inflammatory bowel disease.  Selection will be based on outstanding academic record, extracurricular activities, essay, and creative presentation.

title: Alghanim, Fouad M.T. Scholarship
Description:: The Adelante All Achievers Scholarship Award is available to full- time students at Iowa State University.  You must be a full member of Adelante Fraternity and have a minimum 3.0 GPA to be eligible for this award.

title: Wollitzer Merit Scholarship for Area or Competitive Studies
Description:: The Wollitzer Merit Scholarship for Area or Competitive Studies is available to students planning to study abroad through the Council on International Educational Exchange Program.  You must demonstrate high achievement and plan to study in Africa, Asia or Latin America or pursue comparative studies in order to qualify for this award.

title: Chuan Ai Lu Engstrom Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Chuan Ai Lu Engstrom Memorial Scholarship is available to full-time students enrolled at an accredited university or college.  You must have a minimum 2.5 GPA and submit a essay of no fewer than 800 words on the topic: "How you envision the global economy in the future." in order to qualify for this award.  Competitive candidates will describe any experiences with a global economy and how you would approach international business if you had the influence.

title: MarvelOptics.com Scholarship Essay Contest
Description:: The MarvelOptics.com Scholarship Essay Contest is available to full-time students enrolled at an accredited four-year university or college.  You must have a minimum 2.5 GPA and submit a 500-word essay on the following topics: "Why is sight/vision important?"  and describe what the following quote means to you: "Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.”   You may also choose to post a one-minute video to YouTube discussing the topics above.

title: Army ROTC/Villanova Scholarship
Description:: The Army ROTC/Villanova Scholarship is available to entering freshmen at Villanova University.  You must meet all minimum academic requirements of the Villanova Scholarship to be eligible for this award.

title: Air Force ROTC/Villanova Scholarship
Description:: The Air Force ROTC/Villanova Scholarship is available to entering freshmen at Villanova University.  You must meet all minimum academic requirements of the Villanova Scholarship to be eligible for this award.

title: Naval ROTC/Villanova Scholarship
Description:: The Air Force ROTC/Villanova Scholarship is available to entering freshmen at Villanova University.  You must meet all minimum academic requirements of the Villanova Scholarship to be eligible for this award.

title: Dolman Law Group Video Essay Contest
Description:: The Dolman Law Group Video Essay Contest is available to current or prospective college students.  You must submit a 2-3 minute video essay (YouTube format preferred) on the following topic: "Much has been made about the potential of driverless and automated car technology in recent years, and many industry observers expect this technology to be widely available within the next decade. Technology is never perfect however, and accidents involving driverless vehicles have already occurred. Various legal issues arise when autonomous cars are involved in accidents, including determining who should be held liable for an accident. In your opinion, who should be held accountable when a driverless vehicle is involved in an accident? The owner? The manufacturer? The software developer?"  Additionally, you must be in good academic standing with your current educational institution to qualify for this bi-annual award.

title: Emerging Leader-Scholar Program
Description:: The Emerging Leader-Scholar Program is available to incoming students at Asbury University.  You must be a U.S. citizen, have a minimum GPA of 3.0, and a minimum 22 ACT / 1020 SAT score to be eligible for this award.

title: Student-Caregiver Scholarship
Description:: The Student-Caregiver Scholarship is available to full - time students who have been caring for an older relative while attending school, and intend to continue to do so while attending college.  To be considered, you must submit your story through a 1500 - word essay or two - minute video detailing your experience being a caregiver.

title: Berkeley College Grant
Description:: The Berkeley College Grant is available to students at Berkeley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 2.0 and demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

title: Berkeley College Alumni Legacy Scholarship
Description:: The Berkeley College Alumni Legacy Scholarship is available to full - time incoming freshmen at Berkeley College.  You must demonstrate a high level of academic achievement and have at least one parent, grandparent, or legal guardian who is a graduate of Berkeley College to be eligible for this award.

title: Berkeley College International Grant
Description:: The Berkeley College International Grant is available to students at Berkeley College.  You must be an international student not currently living in the United States to be eligible for this award.

title: Phi Theta Kappa Scholarship - Berkeley College
Description:: The Phi Theta Kappa Scholarship is available to transfer students at Berkeley College.  You must be a member of Phi Theta Kappa to be eligible for this award.

title: Berkeley College Honors Scholarship
Description:: The Berkeley College Honors Scholarship is available to full - time freshman students at Berkeley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.0 and be accepted into the College’s Honors Program to be eligible for this award.

title: Gagne, Scherer and Associates Scholarship
Description:: The Gagne, Scherer and Associates Scholarship is available to students currently enrolled in or planning to enroll for the 2017 school year at a college or university. You must submit a 500-1000 word essay on the following topic: "Members of the United States military are subject to a special set of laws known as the Uniform Code of Military Justice (UCMJ). There are many offenses contained the UCMJ that criminalize conduct, that, while perhaps frowned upon by some, is completely legal for civilians. It is generally argued that these laws are necessary to preserve order and discipline among military members. Do you agree? Why or why not?"

title: Visionary Scholarship
Description:: The Visionary Scholarship is available to current law school students or undergraduate students planning on attending an accredited law school.  You must have a minimum 2.8 GPA and submit a 500-1000 word essay to qualify for this award.

title: Presidential Scholarships
Description:: The Presidential Scholarships is open to first-year freshmen entering Wells College.  You must be nominated by the Admissions Committee and have a minimum GPA of 3.7 to be eligible for this award.

title: Dean's Awards
Description:: The Dean's Awards is open to first-year freshmen entering Wells College.  You must be nominated by the Admissions Committee to be eligible for this award.

title: AMCA Student Paper Competition
Description:: The AMCA Student Paper Competition is open to student members of the AMCA.  You must submit a paper at the AMCA annual meeting in your chosen mosquito related research field in order to be considered for this award.

title: National Hispanic Recognition Award
Description:: The National Hispanic Recognition Award is available to undergraduate as a new, first-time students at Abilene Christian University.  You must be named a National Hispanic Recognition Award recipient to be eligible for this award.  This award is renewal if you maintain a minimum GPA of 2.5.

title: National Achievement Scholarship
Description:: The National Achievement Scholarship is available to undergraduate as a new, first-time students at Abilene Christian University.  You must be named a Semifinalist or Finalist by the National Achievement Program to be eligible for this award.  This award is renewable if you maintain a minimum GPA of 3.20.
